questions.experience: What kind of hands-on experience do you have?
questions.interests: Interests within the field of computer science?

answers.paragraph-who: A 2nd year CS master's student who enjoys working with people and is always ready to learn new skills.
answers.paragraph-skills: I have hands-on experience with software development through my university’s project course where we developed a software for a client. Our project was related to calibrating weighing instruments with AR-glasses. I have also gained experience with frontend-development from making this website. I am currently working as a head teaching assitant and developer for my university's programming course.
answers.paragraph-interests: In addition to software delopment I am particularly interested in machine learning, which is something I want to pursue in my master's, and computer graphics.
answers.paragraph-others: Outside of school and work you can find me hanging out with horses or painting. I also enjoy playing piano and football.
answers.paragraph-random: My last name 'Ma' means horse in Chinese.
